mainContent.main-text: Discover world of podcasts with us
mainContent.content-text: Experience a new way to enjoy podcasts with our innovative app. Browse, and share your favorite shows anytime, anywhere.

podcastInfo.f1heading: A Platform for Hosting Both Audio and Video Podcasts
podcastInfo.info-text-audio: Listen to your favourite podcasts and watch videos seamlessly on our platform
podcastInfo.info-text-video: Discover a new way to consume content with our platform's video capabilities.
podcastInfo.info-text1: Enjoy offline listening and curated playlists for a personalized experience
podcastInfo.info-text2: Listen at your preferred pace with adjustable playback speed
podcastInfo.info-text3: Explore a wide range of podcasts and videos to expand your horizons
